page.title: 16AIRPORT HOTEL CATERING
page.content: The{St.George Hotel,}Teesside airport, deals with travellers, air crews and local evening visitors. A variety of meals are offered, ranging from snacks to full course meals. In the{restaurant}the menu changes every day. Fresh fish and sea food are flown in daily on the early morning flight. A wide selection of wines are also available for the discerning palate. A{marquee}is sometimes erected to cater for large and special events, such as the first re-union in June 1985, of the Canadian squadron who were based at the airport during World War Two, when the airfield was an operational RAF base.
